xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/329750-(Dis)Honesty: The Truth About Lies 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kqn5YPQySbYgum0VJzOZza8gOsq.jpg Documentary exploring the human tendency to be dishonest. Inspired by the work of social scientist, Dan Ariely, the film interweaves personal stories, expert opinions, behavioral experiments, and archival footage to reveal how and why people lie. (Dis)Honesty: The Truth About Lies
